snippet.title: Tales of Radiance - Pre-registration Available for Android/iOS
snippet.description:
Welcome to Tales of Radiance — Grab your gear, call your heroes, and get ready to summon mighty gods in the name of vanquishing evil!

You can play with a 5v5 auto-battle system, free summons, hero conversions, and more!
To start your adventure, click to pre-register:  

iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/tales-of-radiance/id1471093488?l=zh&ls=1
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rsg.talesofradiance
